popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing dealing damage at range. When caught in melee, hits hard briefly and escapes.
A mastery path focused on applying effects to your enemy as you chase them down or run away. Finishing power is located in melee combat.
A mastery path focused on fighting multiple enemies at medium range.

data.name: Acid Arrow
data.description: An attack which deals X corporeal damage and causes your target to take a Y ability penalty to armor and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Assault Stance
data.note: Can only have one active stance.
data.description:
A close-combat stance which causes you to gain a 49 unique bonus to strength, +45% auto attack damage, +10% parry, and reducing the damage you take from melee attacks by 20%. Your non-melee attacks will have 40% less range.

While in Assault Stance; your ballistic skill from items will also count towards your strength, your dodge strikethrough from items will also count towards your parry strikethrough, and your ranged critical chance from items will also count towards your melee critical chance.

data.name: Barrage
data.description: Deals X physical damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you every second, up to 40 feet away snaring targets hit by 30% for the duration.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to elemental resistance.

data.name: Blood-Soaked War
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain 321 health.

data.name: Broadhead Arrow
data.description:
An ailment which deals X physical damage to your target over 15 seconds.

If you are Unwavering, this ability will deal Y corporeal damage at the end of its duration.

data.name: Brutal Assault
data.description:
Deals X physical damage to your target.
If you use this ability while Vengeful or behind the target, it will not go on cooldown.

data.name: Bullseye
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you also become 10% more vulnerable to being critically hit.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 40 action points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to dodge all ranged attacks and disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Adjourning Strike
data.description:
A quick strike which deals X physical damage to your target. If the target was builing up an ability, it is interupted and you deal Y damage instead.

If you are Fervent, you will strike enemies within 20ft of the target as well.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Rebounds
data.description: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Distracting Shot
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Draw Blood
data.description:
An ailment which deals X physical damage over 9 seconds.

If you are Unwavering, the duration is increased to 18s.

data.name: Eagle Eye
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals X physical damage.

data.name: Enchanted Arrows
data.description: Eagle Eye will now deal corporeal damage, and Acid Arrow will now cause your target to take a (7.5 * rank) ability penalty to corporeal resistance

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Harpoon Arrow
data.note:
Requires Skirmish or Assault Stance
Target must be ailing.
data.description:
You fire an arrow into your enemy dealing X physical damage. If you are in skirmish stance, the arrow will knock the target down for 3 seconds. If you are in assault stance, you will pull yourself to the target.

The ability can be used again in a different stance than you originally fired it for 6 seconds before the cooldown begins.

data.name: Fell The Weak
data.description: Deals X physical damage if your target is below 40% hit points, or Y physical damage otherwise.

data.name: Festering Arrow
data.description: Deals X corporeal damage to your target and applies an ailment which inflicts an additional Y corporeal damage for 4 seconds.

data.name: Flame Arrow
data.description:
Your target is caught on fire taking X corporeal damage over 8s. As the fires consume them, increasing amount of damage.

If you are Unwavering, then Flame Arrow will reapply itself when it goes out.

data.name: Flanking Shot
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target. If the target is at full health, they will take an additional Y physical damage over 10 seconds. If you are behind the target, they will take an additional Z physical damage to the target. This arrow has no flight time.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Glass Arrow
data.description: Deals X physical damage to the target and all enemies within 20 feet over 8 seconds. For the duration, the targets will have 25% reduced range.

data.name: Grim Slash
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target.

data.name: Guerrilla Training
data.description: Your ranged attacks deal an additional 25% critical damage against targets afflicted with Draw Blood. In addition, your Grim Slash will deal X additional damage for each Path of The Unwavering DoT on the target.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Shadow's Fervor
data.description: An shadowy fervor fills your group for 10 seconds, granting them a 25% increased attack speed and reducing the cost of their abilities by 33%.

data.name: Instill Fear
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Instinctive Aim
data.description: Gives a 120 unique bonus to strength, ballistic skill, and weaponskill, and a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Leading Shots
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by 10% for 10 seconds for group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Lileath's Arrow
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals X corporeal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away. This ability can be used twice within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

data.name: Lileath's Forgiveness
data.description: Removes all hexes, curses, cripples, and ailments from you. You regain 250 action points.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to ballistic skill.

data.name: Merciless Soldier
data.description: Dealing critical damage will cause your next source of direct damage to deal an additional X physical damage.

data.name: No Quarter
data.description: Eagle's Eye, Acid Arrow, and Festering Arrow now builds up 1 seconds faster. Brutal Assault now costs 50% less action points.

data.name: No Respite
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Opportunistic Strike
data.description:
A crippling attack that deals X physical damage.

If you are in Scout or Skirmish Stance, you will silence the target for 4 seconds. If you are in Assault Stance, you will disarm the target for 4 seconds.

data.name: Outrider Patrol
data.description: Arrows strike the ground at a spot you select, dealing 1200 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Penetrating Arrow
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, and an additional 1200 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy dodges or parries any of your attacks, their chances to dodge and parry will be reduced by 10% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot refresh.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Rain of Steel
data.description: You repeatedly shoot arrows at the ground for 10 seconds, dealing 219 damage every second to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Rapid Fire
data.description:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, X physical damage to the enemy every 0.4 seconds for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then the channel is increased by 1 second.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 action points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scout Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A long-distance bow stance that increases the range of your non-melee attacks by 50%.

data.name: Shadow Sting
data.description: An ailment which deals X corporeal damage to your target over 10 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker.

data.name: Skirmish Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A close-range bow stance that reduces your damage by 30% but you can move while casting abilities. You gain the ability to autoattack while moving and your ballistic skill from items will also count towards your strength while in this stance.

data.name: Smoldering Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow's damage over time is increased to X corporeal damage.

data.name: Spiral-Fletched Arrow
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target and enemies within 20ft. If you are Fervent, targets struck will take an additional X corporeal damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Split Arrows
data.description: Broad Head Arrow and Flame Arrow now hit all enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Unwavering Advance
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your group gains a (Rank * 4) ability bonus to weaponskill and the effect of snares is reduced by 50% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Sweeping Slash
data.description: Deals X physical damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 25 feet away. If you are Fervent, targets struck will take an additional X corporeal damage every second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Swift Strikes
data.description: Deals (low) X physical damage three times to your target. You will gain 10% movement speed for 5 seconds for each strike that lands.

data.name: Takedown
data.description: An ailment which deals X physical damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Shot
data.description: Deals X physical damage to target and all enemies within 20 feet. Each of those enemies suffer 50% increased set back chance for the next 6 seconds. If you are fervent, the duration is increased to 10 seconds.

data.name: Vengeance of Nagarythe
data.description: You are filled with a desire for vengeance, increasing your critical strike chance by 25% and the critical chance of your group by 5% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whirling Pin
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Whirling Rage
data.description: Deals (267 + 53.33 * assault rank) damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Elven Adriotness
data.description:
Whenever you deal direct damage with a melee attack, the damage of all your ranged attacks is increased by 15% for 6 seconds.

Whenever you deal direct damage with a ranged attack, the damage of all your melee attacks is increased by 15% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Exploit Opportunity
data.description: Deal X corporeal damage to target enemy. They will take a (Rank * 3) ability penalty to initiative for 10 seconds. If you are Vengeful, the duration will be increased to 15 seconds, and the target will take Y corporeal damage every 3 seconds.

data.name: Call to Arms
data.description: Reduces the cooldown on your Shadow Emanations by 10 seconds.
